name: Stack Clone (Lewis Stephens)
description:
As part of the Unity USC Games Unlocked Course I need to develop a game based on the theme: Layers. I decided to make a clone of the game Stack. I found this video from Jason Weimann which walks you through developing the core gameplay loop. 

In this game you, the player, need to stack moving and blocks on one another. The objective is to stack as many blocks as you can, building a tall tower. When you miss the tower, you lose. 

This is just the prototype with the core gameplay loop and score counter. I still need to: 

  • Fix the bug which spawns a black square every time the game starts
  • Build a game handler, adding a menu with a pause and quit game function 
  • Track high scores
  • Increased difficulty by increasing the blocks speed over time
  • Make the moving blocks bounce back and forth over the tower (currently they fly off screen)
  • Add sound effects
  • Add particle effects 
  • Improve the colours
